fields.name: ClientId
fields.description: The public identifier for the application

fields.name: ClientSecret
fields.description: The secret known only to the application and the authorization server

fields.name: MetadataUrl
fields.description: The URI of a JSON file with generic OIDC provider configuration.

fields.name: Scopes
fields.description: It defines the specific actions applications can be allowed to do on a user's behalf
